attributes.action: Womens land army medal not afforded to next of kin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to recieve, posthoumesley my mothers Land Army Medal: according to what I am led to believe next of kin are not entitled.
My mother died 1999, before this medal was awarded.
Surely, on her behalf, I should be allowed to recieve her medal.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
